taskbody.prereq: A workflow file cannot exist outside of a package. The following steps assume that you have an existing Design Studio (DS) Workbench package.
taskbody.context: There is no limit to the number of workflow files that you can create in a package.

step.cmd: On the DS Navigator view pane, click the package in which you want to create a new workflow.
Right-click the project folder name, and select New Workflow.
step.stepresult: The Create Workflow Diagram dialog box is displayed.

step.cmd: In the Workflow Name field, type the name of the new workflow.
In the Description field, type a description of the workflow.

step.stepresult: The name of the new workflow is displayed in the DS Navigator view pane in the appropriate package.

step.cmd: In the Properties view pane, complete all fields (mandatory fields are indicated with an asterisk).
step.info: For more information about how to complete the fields in the Properties view pane, see section Workflow properties.
